THEY CAME TO THE COMSTOCK...
IT WAS JUST A GODFORSAKEN MOUNTAINSIDE BUT NO PLACE ON EARTH WAS RICHER IN SILVER.
FOR A BUSTLING ENTERPRISING AMERICA, THIS WAS THE GREAT BONANZA.
THE DREAMERS, THE RESTLESS, THE BUILDERS, THE VULTURES--THEY WERE LURED BY THE GLITTERING PROMISE OF INSTANT RICHES AND SURVIVED THE BRUTAL HARDSHIPS OF A MINING CAMP TO RAISE A LEGENDARY BOOM TOWN.
BUT SOME SOUGHT MORE THAN WEALTH.
